Package org.gbif.hbase.util

Class ResultReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.hbase.util.ResultReader
  • public class ResultReader
extends Object
    Static utility methods for reading (Java) typed fields from an HBase Result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static byte[] getBytes​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, byte[] defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and return it uninterpreted as byte[].
      static Double getDouble​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, Double defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and interpret as Double.
      static Float getFloat​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, Float defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and interpret as Float.
      static Integer getInteger​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, Integer defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and interpret as Integer.
      static Long getLong​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, Long defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and interpret as Long.
      static String getString​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName, String defaultValue)
      Read the value of this cell and interpret as String.
      static Long getTimestamp​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row, String columnFamily, String columnName)

    • Method Detail

      • getString

        public static String getString​(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result row,
                               String columnFamily,
                               String columnName,
                               String defaultValue)
        Read the value of this cell and interpret as String.
        Parameters:
        row - the HBase Result from which to read
        columnFamily - column family that holds the column
        columnName - column or "qualifier"
        defaultValue - returned if value at columnName is null
        Returns:
        the value from the specified column, or defaultValue if it's null/doesn't exist
